thread.title: Maynard Long
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by Maynard Long

author: Maynard Long
title: Maynard Long
text: We have dealt with Grand in Christiansburg,VA.for many years and with one salesman ( G.C.) in particular who has been very helpful in guiding us to the best items for our particular needs at each particular visit. We have come to trust and respect his guidance and been happy with each and every purchase we have made from Grands. On our last Purchase G.C. advised he had received an advancement in bedding and would have to turn us over to another sales person. We asked G.C. to please help us as much as possible and he did so and we purchased bedding and a headboard and C.G. gave the sale to a co-worker. We sure appreciated his assistance! The delivery guys did a good gob even though they had to come back to finish the job (no big deal). The bed is wonderful!!!
